function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Change in use of green areas due to COVID-19 restrictions","Impact":"Reduction of social interaction and physical activity, affecting mental and physical health","Mitigation":"Implementing alternative outdoor spaces for socialization, promoting home-based exercise, and providing online mental health support","Technologies":"Online platforms for mental health-related services, virtual social communities, and exercise apps","People":"Residents, especially those reliant on green areas for physical activity and social interaction","Owner":"Local governments, community organizations, and mental health support services"},{"Description":"Confusion and disputes regarding lockdown measures in public parks","Impact":"Disruption of social order and increased tension among residents","Mitigation":"Clear communication of lockdown guidelines, enforcement of social distancing rules, and community engagement to address concerns","Technologies":"Public communication platforms, social media, and community apps for reporting and addressing issues","People":"Residents, park visitors, and local authorities","Owner":"Local governments and community leaders"},{"Description":"Reporting of crowded parks leading to unnecessary police intervention","Impact":"Strain on law enforcement resources and diversion of attention from critical tasks","Mitigation":"Educating the public on relevant reporting and redirecting reports to appropriate channels for addressing crowded park incidents","Technologies":"Public education campaigns, mobile reporting apps for non-urgent concerns, and centralized reporting systems","People":"Residents, law enforcement agencies, and park management authorities","Owner":"Local governments and community organizations"}]}
